subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The jockey Garrett Gomez can match Jerry Bailey’s record of 70 stakes wins in a year with a victory today in the $65,000-added War Chant Stakes on the opening day of Hollywood Park’s 32-day Autumn Meet in Inglewood, Calif.Gomez will ride Karazi in the one-mile race for 3-year-olds. Bailey set the record four years ago.
